column4: hello, i am having a prob with my mic on skype, others can't hear me, but my cam works fine, so they cam see me, any help?
does it work in other apps?
i havent check this but it works on guvcview
then i would, try sound recorder. Skype can be a pig and not work even if the hardware works in other apps
like what programm?
sound recorder
is it on synaptic?
its in a default install
no, it doesn;t works
should i give you the model of cam?
run:  lsusb   the 8 character hex ID will help you find guides
http://pastebin.com/LPPgGDxy
no, use the ID in websearches
i didn't find anything could you help me? id 046d:081d
in sound settings, is the mic item set to the webcams?
pulse audio server (local)
may help http://www.suseitalia.org/forum/hardware/webcam-logitech-hd-c510
on audio settings is has only the pulse audio server (local)
is that ok?
sure, its just changing the audio device
